cause.description:
This is a organization that helps people that there family members were killed or hurt in terrorist attacks. It is located in Jerusalem Israel, and helps anyone that needs help. They help the victims financially, physically, and mentally. We pay for there medical expenses, and help them find jobs etc.
1. We will be there untill the terrorists are gone!
2. It's a shame how hard it is to get financial from the goverment!
3. If the goverment does not help them we will!
cause.name: Ohr Meir and Bracha
